scripts.postinstall: bower install namlook/eurekapp && npm run build && (cd public; if ! [ -d bower_components ]; then ln -s ../bower_components .; fi)
scripts.build-templates: if [ -d js/client/templates ]; then ember-precompile js/client/templates/*.hbs > public/templates.js; fi
scripts.build: npm run build-app && npm run build-templates
